## TFormErrors type

A collection of error messages associated with inputs, keyed by input ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TFormErrors = {
    [inputId: string]: TTextObject;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [TTextObject](./react-teams.ttextobject.md)
